page.title: 08Annual Shows- Powburn,Ingram
page.content:
Each year a show is held in Powburn and Ingram. The Powburn sho is usually in August. Ingram Show is held in September.These shows are very well supported by the people of the area.
Local people are given the opportunity to enter competitions for homegrown flowers, vegetables as well as homemade jams, chutneys, wines, bread and cakes. The industrial tent reflects peoples' prowess in many areas.
Children are not forgotten. There are classes for painting, handwriting, pattern printing, sewing and modelling. Children's sports also take place. Pony sports are also a popular feature of both shows. There are classes for sheep too at Ingram Show.Both shows are popular meetings.
